attributes.action: Stop Bicester Doctor’s surgeries from being moved out of town.
attributes.background: The proposal is to merge local central surgeries to create one large super surgery on an out of town development which will will adversely affect the very ill and the elderly

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. This seems to be the responsibility of your local council and your local Clinical Commissioning Group (CCG).

You can contact your local CCG here:

https://www.oxfordshireccg.nhs.uk/about-us/contact-us.htm

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You could also raise this issue with your MP. You can use this page to find out who this is and how to contact them:

https://www.parliament.uk/mps-lords-and-offices/mps/
